item.title: Virtual Diva IA’s New EP, “Pray for Real” On Sale!
item.dc:creator: nate
item.description:
World renowned virtual diva and singer, IA, has released her latest EP as of December 9, 2020. It features a collaboration with singer/songwriter MINMI, who provided tracks as well as guest vocals on the EP. In addition, TomoLow (known for work with Namie Amuro, Nogizaka 46) and world class artist DANTZ (Ultra Music Festival performer) …

The post Virtual Diva IA’s New EP, “Pray for Real” On Sale! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
World renowned virtual diva and singer, IA, has released her latest EP as of December 9, 2020. It features a collaboration with singer/songwriter MINMI, who provided tracks as well as guest vocals on the EP. In addition, TomoLow (known for work with Namie Amuro, Nogizaka 46) and world class artist DANTZ (Ultra Music Festival performer) have joined as producers.

The album itself focuses on core themes of “Life, love, and peace”. In this three-part structure, IA sings her message of all lifeforms to live in harmony, stopping environmental destruction, and the threat of species going extinct.

Additionally, the trailer teaser for all tracks is currently up for your viewing!

Track Listing

  1. pray for real feat.MINMI
    Lyrics and song by: MINMI
    Composition by: TomoLow
  2. DIAMANTE
    Lyrics and song by: Sho Fujiwara/Ryosuke Kataoka/Ryo Ito
    Composition by: Sho Fujiwara/Ryosuke Kataoka
  3. Re-PLANET
    Lyrics by: Alicia Stamkos/TomoLow/AIJ/Kei Hiroki
    Song by: Alicia Stamkos/TomoLow
    Composition by: TomoLow
  4. Conqueror-DANTZ Remix
    Lyrics by: Clémentine Jane
    Song by: Sendra

Product Information

Name：pray for real

Artist：IA
Included：CD + DVD + special lyric card + limited sticker + special calendar
*sticker and calendar only available for the 1st lot 
Number of disks: CD x 1 / DVD x 1
Product Number: IPCD-2001/2002
Release date: December 9th 2020
Price: 2,500 JPY (tax not included) 
JAN:  4582364266842
Publisher: 1st PLACE

[Store limited bonus] *limited units

TOWER RECORDS: original jacket art X-mas version pin badge
ANIMATE: original jacket art B3 poster
HMV: original jacket art pin badge
NEO WING (CD JAPAN): original jacket art 2L size portrait
Amazon.co.jp: original jacket art post card

The post Virtual Diva IA’s New EP, “Pray for Real” On Sale! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: IA’s MUSICAL & LIVE SHOW “ARIA” OST Available For Pre-Order!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
In an announcement made on IA’s official Facebook page, 1st Place has revealed that the pre-orders for the MUSICAL & LIVE SHOW “ARIA” ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK have opened for all fans worldwide! This new soundtrack features 21 high quality songs and 5 new vocal tracks. This CD was sold at exclusive events in Japan and overseas, …

The post IA’s MUSICAL & LIVE SHOW “ARIA” OST Available For Pre-Order! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
In an announcement made on IA’s official Facebook page, 1st Place has revealed that the pre-orders for the MUSICAL & LIVE SHOW “ARIA” ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK have opened for all fans worldwide!

This new soundtrack features 21 high quality songs and 5 new vocal tracks. This CD was sold at exclusive events in Japan and overseas, making it a very sought after piece among fans. It includes multiple messages recorded by IA too!

In this amazing soundtrack you’ll be able to recognize multiple popular producers from the scene such as Shinichi Osawa (MONDO GROSSO), TeddyLoid, ANANT-GARDE EYES, Ishifuro, and DJ DANTZ.

Fans that place their pre-orders through Tokyo Otaku Mode or CD Japan will obtain a one-of-a-kind free item. If you also pre-order through Tokyo Otaku Mode, you’ll receive a special set of badges, while those that do it through CD Japan will receive an acrylic keychain.

Product Information

Artist: IA
Title: MUSICAL & LIVE SHOW “ARIA” ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK (Featuring 21 songs)
Release Date: March 18, 2020
Digital Release Date: March 18, 2020 (Available in multiple streaming services worldwide)
Price: 3,500 yen (excluding tax)

Tracklist

  • Introduction ～Planet ARIA～
  • ARIA’s Breath
  • Dawn of the Planet ARIA
  • HAVE FUN!
  • Discord
  • The National Anthem Of ARIA
  • One Heart
  • Resonance World ～Inner Journey～
  • LIFE LOVE PEACE
  • PARTY A GO-GO
  • Conqueror
  • 絶対領域
  • ホロンボット feat. IA (ARIA Ver.)
  • Reload
  • 夜咄ディセイブ -TeddyLoid Hopping Remix-
  • てるみい (Live Version)
  • Euphoria (Live Version)
  • Resonance World
  • The Eternity And More
  • Higher
  • ARIA ON THE PLANETES ～Best wishes for you～

Pre-Order Information

You can pre-order this amazing soundtrack from the following websites:

CD JAPAN (Click Me)

Tokyo Otaku Mode (Click Me)

Note: Available for international shipping only.

Sources

IA Official World Page on Facebook

The post IA’s MUSICAL & LIVE SHOW “ARIA” OST Available For Pre-Order! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: “KAITO 14th Anniversary” Special Release Is Out Now!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
Hello everyone! When you talk about February you start thinking of Valentine’s Day and things like that, right? Well, it is also KAITO‘s debut anniversary! And today the guys at KARENT have officially announced the release of a special collection of KAITO songs in commemorance of his debut. The songs included in this new collection …

The post “KAITO 14th Anniversary” Special Release Is Out Now! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Hello everyone!

When you talk about February you start thinking of Valentine’s Day and things like that, right? Well, it is also KAITO‘s debut anniversary! And today the guys at KARENT have officially announced the release of a special collection of KAITO songs in commemorance of his debut.

The songs included in this new collection are:

  • ♪ Hanairo (feat. KAITO) / Kashi Moimi
  • ♪ Dochira Ga Yugamu? (feat. KAITO) / Shiso-P
  • ♪ The Sea of Adoration (feat. KAITO) / noto
  • ♪ Utahama (feat. KAITO) / F.Koshiba (wandererP)
  • ♪ one of them (feat. KAITO) / HzEdge (crystal P)
  • ♪ Bright red lotus (feat. KAITO) / Kid P
  • ♪ Attakaito (feat. KAITO) / halyosy
  • ♪ Blue Tourmaline (feat. KAITO) / amyu

Where to get the “KAITO 14th Anniversary” Collection?

These songs are available for purchase from stores such as the iTunes Store and Amazon Music, as well as LINE MUSIC and Spotify!

All songs can be accessed from KARENT’s official website and will re-direct you to the aforementioned stores so you can make your purchase.

Sources

Hatsune Miku Official Blog

KARENT’s Official Website

The post “KAITO 14th Anniversary” Special Release Is Out Now! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: New UNI Album “24-Hour Symphony” Preorders Open!
item.dc:creator: Momoi
item.description:
It’s been nearly a year since the last official update from VOCALOID4 UNI’s parent company, ST Media. But big news just hit from their official YouTube: a new album is over the horizon! UNI’s latest album, 24-Hour Symphony, is now available to pre-order! The album is set to come out on December 16, 2019. Pre-orders …

The post New UNI Album “24-Hour Symphony” Preorders Open! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
It’s been nearly a year since the last official update from VOCALOID4 UNI’s parent company, ST Media. But big news just hit from their official YouTube: a new album is over the horizon!

UNI’s latest album, 24-Hour Symphony, is now available to pre-order! The album is set to come out on December 16, 2019. Pre-orders run from 11/27 – 12/14, so get yours in to qualify for some sweet bonuses! The price is currently set for 18,000 won (~$15 USD), not including shipping.

The album will feature music by renowned Korean VOCALOID producer, Sangnoksu (Evergreen, theyears12, ProgressU). 24-Hour Symphony is actually the first album by the esteemed artist in nearly six years!

The tracklist is filled with a mixture of covers and originals, all sung by the world’s first Korean V4.

Tracklist

  1. 천년의 시 (The Poem of a Millennia) – UNI ver.
  2. Installation
  3. 벚꽃비 (Cherry Blossoms in the Rain)
  4. 25시 (25 o’clock)
  5. 행성의 소나타 (Sonata Planet) – UNI ver.
  6. 해에게서 달까지 (From the Sun to the Moon) – UNI ver.
  7. 태양이 춤추는 나라 (The Land Where the Sun Dances)
  8. 20년 뒤의 나에게 (20 Years Later to Me)
  9. 다물 (Tea)
  10. 24시간의 교향곡 (24-Hour Symphony)

There are several songs that are homages to the original SeeU versions, reworked to feature UNI’s vocals!

The album also features UNI originals, including a demo song from Sangnoksu and one of her first originals. Not only that, but it also features three completely new songs currently exclusive to this album!

Preorder Bonuses

While the preorder period for the album is a little over two weeks, there are some bonuses ST Media announced. While supplies last, people who purchase the album could receive a couple different items!

The first preorder bonus is a 10cm x 15cm illustration card featuring the album cover. This is an enticing prize by itself, but there’s another potential product you can get, as well!

People who preorder quickly enough can also receive an MR download card of the album for digital use!

Sneak Peek

The official page for UNI’s latest album features some reveal images of the album’s physical case and disc!

Furthermore, ST Media has confirmed that the album will be released as a co-production alongside another company. The South Korea-Japan joint venture, milkyway TRAXX, will help ensure high production quality. According to Character Planet, working alongside TRAXX will let them put out the best product for you all!

The official YouTube preview trailer has been released! Take a look, here:

Preorder the album here, on Character Planet!

How excited are you for the newest UNI release? Let us know in the comments!

Sources

ST Media is on Twitter, YouTube and their official product website, Character Planet!
Sangnoksu can be found on Twitter, YouTube and SoundCloud.

The post New UNI Album “24-Hour Symphony” Preorders Open! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Big AL Anniversary Album Up for Pre-order!
item.dc:creator: Momoi
item.description:
Longtime fans of the iconic VOCALOID2 Big AL will be getting a gift this year for his tenth anniversary! The project was started by The Big Alliance Twitter, a group dedicated to celebrating Big AL’s tenth year. According to The Big Alliance, the album comes with twelve tracks which are exclusives from Western producers! Additionally, …

The post Big AL Anniversary Album Up for Pre-order! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Longtime fans of the iconic VOCALOID2 Big AL will be getting a gift this year for his tenth anniversary!

The project was started by The Big Alliance Twitter, a group dedicated to celebrating Big AL’s tenth year. According to The Big Alliance, the album comes with twelve tracks which are exclusives from Western producers!

Additionally, the album will be available both in digital and physical formats. Set for a December 22, 2019 release, we have more details, below!

Digital Version

Now, for fans interested in supporting Big AL, the digital edition is $10 USD. This edition includes;

  • Free unlimited streaming access via the Bandcamp app
  • MP3 and FLAC, as well as other downloadable formats for the album

Not only that but the artist Accelastar designed the cover! What’s not to love about this album?

Physical Version

The physical album is priced $15 USD, and comes with several bonuses!

  • A physical CD and jewel case
  • All tracks listed in an accompanying booklet which includes lyrics
  • A merchandise set that comes with a charm, as well as stickers and a button
  • A digital copy of the album, which also includes all digital edition bonuses!

Furthermore, the physical version will be shipping out on December 22, 2019!

Tracklist

As of now, there are twelve tracks full of wonderfully talented artists! Here’s the official list.

  1. Royalty – Circus-P
  2. dopamine_machine – Ferry
  3. Forlorn Sky – Lystrialle & DoNotCrossP
  4. Break In Two – baggagelizard
  5. Midas – Kodakami & Kaichou
  6. Balloon – Cecil // UtaYamato
  7. Monarch – EmpathP
  8. The Alibi – Shius
  9. Call Me Back – GuitarHeroPianoZero
  10. Justice – Mrs. Peach
  11. Grand Avalon Casino – MystSaphyr
  12. Cologne – nostraightanswer

Not only that, but all proceeds will be donated to Musicians Without Borders!

Which track are you most excited for? Let us know in the comments!

Sources

The Big Alliance is on Twitter and their website!

The post Big AL Anniversary Album Up for Pre-order! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Mitchie M “Virtual Popstar” Album Released
item.dc:creator: Monds
item.description:
Mitchie M’s newest album feat. Hatsune Miku has now been released and is titled “Virtual Popstar“. The artwork on the album was illustrated by Haruhiko Mikimoto who is the designer for the famous Macross series!   Album There are several options for purchasing the album. Cd Japan Regular Edition: Includes the album only, for 2,700 …

The post Mitchie M “Virtual Popstar” Album Released appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
Mitchie M’s newest album feat. Hatsune Miku has now been released and is titled “Virtual Popstar“. The artwork on the album was illustrated by Haruhiko Mikimoto who is the designer for the famous Macross series!

 

Album

There are several options for purchasing the album.

Cd Japan

Regular Edition: Includes the album only, for 2,700 JPY and can be purchased here.

Limited Edition: Includes the album and a DVD for 3,939 JPY and can be purchased here.

Both the above include a tin badge that is randomly selected among a set of 6.

 

Limited Edition with Vinyl: Includes the album and a vinyl for 4,000 JPY. You purchase the vinyl version here. It also includes a bonus A4-sized clear folder.

You can also purchase the album on other platforms as well, although you will need a forwarding service for these as they are Japanese websites.

Amazon JP

You can purchase the regular edition here for 2,970 JPY and the limited edition here for 4,400 JPY. This version includes a mouse pad as a bonus.

Tower Records

You can purchase the regular edition here for 2,970 JPY and the limited edition here for 4,333 JPY. This version includes a B2 calendar poster as a bonus.

Animate

You can purchase the regular edition here for 2,970 JPY and the limited edition here for 4,332 JPY. This version includes an A3 clear poster as a bonus.

Tsutaya

You purchase the regular edition here for 2,970 JPY and the limited edition here for 4,332 JPY. This version includes a mini colored paper as a bonus.

Tracklist

There are tons of tracks available on the album as well as the bonuses which definitely make it worth the asking price.

Disc 1

  • 1: 大江戸ジュリアナイト
    Mitchie M feat. 初音ミク, KAITO V3 (Straight)
  • 2: 好き！雪！本気マジック
    Mitchie M feat. 初音ミク, 初音ミク V3 (English)
  • 3: ぶれないアイで (
    Mitchie M feat. 初音ミク V3 (Original
  • 4: リングの熾天使
    Mitchie M feat. 初音ミク, 鏡音リン
  • 5: ニュース39 (
    Mitchie M feat. 初音ミク
  • 6: アメイジングマジシャン
    Mitchie M feat. 初音ミク
  • 7: 自己愛性カワイズム
    Mitchie M feat. 初音ミク
  • 8: イメトレブギー
    Mitchie M feat. 初音ミク
  • 9: 暗殺プリンセス 
    Mitchie M feat. 初音ミク
  • 10: 歌の棲む家～メゾン初音～
    OSTER project, Mitchie M feat. 初音ミク
  • 11: REBEL DIVA
    Mitchie M feat. 初音ミク
  • 12: Noiseless Heart
    Mitchie M feat. 初音ミク, 初音ミク V3 (English)
  • 13: 未来序曲
    Mitchie M, ビクターミュージックアーツ feat. various
  • 14: ガールズフレンドシップ
    Mitchie M feat. 初音ミク, 巡音ルカ
  • 15: BELIEVE IN YOURSELF
    Mitchie M feat. 初音ミク
  • 16: キュート・メドレー ～アイドル サウンズ～
    Mitchie M feat. 初音ミク
  • 17: ガールズフレンドシップ [Symphony ver.]
    Mitchie M feat. 初音ミク, 巡音ルカ

Disc 2 

  • 1: 好き！雪！本気マジック
    Mitchie M feat. 初音ミク, 初音ミク V3 (English)
  • 2: ぶれないアイで
    Mitchie M feat. 初音ミク V3 (Original)
  • 3: ニュース39
    Mitchie M feat. 初音ミク
  • 4: キュート・メドレー ～アイドル サウンズ～
    Mitchie M feat. 初音ミク
  • 5: 大江戸ジュリアナイト
    Mitchie M feat. 初音ミク, KAITO V3 (Straight)
  • 6: 歌の棲む家～メゾン初音～
    OSTER project, Mitchie M feat. 初音ミク

    Mitchie M feat. 初音ミク, 鏡音リン

    Mitchie M feat. 初音ミク

Vinyl

If you are still uncertain on purchasing the album, check out the album sample below and subscribe to Mitchie M’s channel!

Will you be purchasing the album? Let us know in the comments!

Links

Twitter

YouTube

item.title: Lupin Announces New Album Syntech-
item.dc:creator: Dane David
item.description:
A little over after a month of the digital release of Syntech+, Lupin a.k.a. nostraightanswer announced the new release date of Syntech-, a new album to complete Syntech0. The digital version is now available for pre-order on Bandcamp. Syntech- will be fully released on Bandcamp and all major music providers on August 23, 2019. Album …

The post Lupin Announces New Album Syntech- appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
A little over after a month of the digital release of Syntech+, Lupin a.k.a. nostraightanswer announced the new release date of Syntech-, a new album to complete Syntech0. The digital version is now available for pre-order on Bandcamp. Syntech- will be fully released on Bandcamp and all major music providers on August 23, 2019.

Syntech- is a self-cover album featuring Lupin’s vocals. The album also includes a few re-arrangements from Syntech+ tracks and remixes from ODDEEO and Circus-P. Additionally, the physical releases of the album will be available with limited supply in the near future through the #InterfaceCollection Kickstarter.

Syntech0 Crossfade

0:00 – 7:50 : Syntech+
7:51 – 17:05 : Syntech-

Tracklist

  1. By My Side
  2. Someday You’ll Notice The Evening Colored Horizon (Self-Cover)
  3. Pushing Daisies (Self-Cover)
  4. Define Me (Self-Cover)
  5. Pacify (Mini-DnB Arrange)
  6. Infinity (ODDEEO Remix) (Vocals: Maika)
  7. My Impulse (Self-Cover)
  8. You Get Me (Self-Cover)
  9. Half-Life (Rainfall Arrange)
  10. Both of Us (Circus-P Remix) (Vocals: DEX & DAINA)
  11. Courage (Nostraightanswer and Circus-P)
  12. And Dawn Anew (Outro)

BUY IT

Bandcamp – Syntech- $9 minimum
Follow Lupin on Twitter for updates on the availability of Syntech0 on its release day

Sources

LUPIN
Bandcamp
Twitter
YouTube
Interface Kickstarter

Circus-P
ODDEEO

The post Lupin Announces New Album Syntech- appeared first on VNN.

item.title: New S.C.X Album “Reverberations 4” to be Released During Comiket 96!
item.dc:creator: Spookie
item.description:
The circle composed by Clean Tears and T-ism, named S.C.X, is going to release an amazing new album during Comic Market 96, titled “Reverberations 4“! About the Album We surely know very well S.C.X’s works, known to be an unmissable quality music creator for any vocaloid fans that loves Trance songs on their playlists! We …

The post New S.C.X Album “Reverberations 4” to be Released During Comiket 96! appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
The circle composed by Clean Tears and T-ism, named S.C.X, is going to release an amazing new album during Comic Market 96, titled “Reverberations 4“!

About the Album

We surely know very well S.C.X’s works, known to be an unmissable quality music creator for any vocaloid fans that loves Trance songs on their playlists! We also find guest artists such as kaito and 泡沫, alongside tak who provided this awesome cover art!

Each tune seems to light up not only Hatsune Miku‘s vocal, but also bring the listener a whole new sound to liven up their days! Let’s have a look at the album’s track list together!

Track list

  1. Intro – Reverberations 4
  2. Eidetic image
  3. Repeat
  4. Clarity
  5. To be style (Reverberations 4 Remix)
  6. Moment (Reverberations 4 Remix)
  7. Observer
  8. SAKURA
  9. SAKURA (Reverberations 4 Remix)

Priced at 1,000 JPY during the event on August 12th and soon 1,200 JPY through various online shops, this album will make an awesome addition to your collection!

We will update the article once more information about online sales will be released, but in the meanwhile don’t forget to follow us on VNN for more content!

You can find more about Comic Market 96 on its official website
You can find Clean Tears (and S.C.X) on Facebook, Youtube, Twitter, SoundCloud, Piapro and their website!
Official page of the album

The post New S.C.X Album “Reverberations 4” to be Released During Comiket 96! appeared first on VNN.

item.title: KarenT Releases Hatsune Miku 12th Anniversary Album Collection
item.dc:creator: mikufan.com
item.description:
In celebration of the upcoming Hatsune Miku 12th anniversary, Crypton Future Media’s music label KarenT has announced a special album collection from 14 producers, now available on iTunes Store, Amazon MP3 and more! Check out more details on the special page with the main visual by the illustrator 4 (Yon)! What do you have in …

The post KarenT Releases Hatsune Miku 12th Anniversary Album Collection appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
In celebration of the upcoming Hatsune Miku 12th anniversary, Crypton Future Media’s music label KarenT has announced a special album collection from 14 producers, now available on iTunes Store, Amazon MP3 and more! Check out more details on the special page with the main visual by the illustrator 4 (Yon)!

What do you have in mind for Hatsune Miku 12th anniversary?

  • Phobos / wotaku
  • Whispermint / Shiiya Yu
  • sign of love / Udon Timer P
  • I hate / amakawa setsu
  • Lazy Cruise / cat nap
  • A bouquet / Minato Itsuki
  • narrow private room e.p. / msr
  • Eve / forute
  • A piece of treasure / Ako
  • Color Of Tears / harunacute
  • Maple Syrup / AETA
  • aquamarine / narry
  • BEST OF DIVA / Nejishiki
  • Lovers Ride A Dream Of Destiny / Saiki Masao

Today once again, this voice carries the joy of singing and the happiness of music.
Here is the Hatsune Miku 12th Anniversary feature!

– Message from KarenT

Hatsune Miku 12th anniversary album collection
https://karent.jp/special/miku19

Source: Mikufan.com

The post KarenT Releases Hatsune Miku 12th Anniversary Album Collection appeared first on VNN.

item.title: Pinocchio-P Announces Self-Remix Album “P+”
item.dc:creator: Dane David
item.description:
To commemorate his 10 years in the music industry, Pinocchio-P has revamped his past works in the form of a remix album P+! The album features 1 new track and 7 remixed songs from his past music catalog. The expected release day is on September 19, 2019. If you want to receive the album earlier, …

The post Pinocchio-P Announces Self-Remix Album “P+” appeared first on VNN.
item.content:encoded:
To commemorate his 10 years in the music industry, Pinocchio-P has revamped his past works in the form of a remix album P+! The album features 1 new track and 7 remixed songs from his past music catalog. The expected release day is on September 19, 2019.

If you want to receive the album earlier, and at a discount price, it will be available at Comiket 96 on August 12, in the Tokyo International Exhibit Center. The venue price of P+ will be at ￥1,500 (approx. $14), while the mail-order price will be ￥1,800 (approx. $16) + tax. A special badge will be available with P+ exclusively for those who purchase the album at the event.

Other Pinocchio-P merchandise will also be available, such as other CDs, rubber straps and masking tape.

CD

As well as P+, these previously released albums will also be available:

Proliferation of Imamura – ￥1,000 (approx. $9)
Comic and Cosmic – ￥2,000 (2CD) (approx. $18)
Antenna – ￥1,000 (approx. $9)
Яareno Collection – ￥1,000 (approx. $9) (Limited Stock)

Goods

Rubber Strap ( ¥ 700 each, approx. $6):
MUSHROOM AIMAINA
MUSHROOM DOUSHITE
IMAMURA AIMAINA

Masking Tape ( ¥ 600, approx. $5. Limited Stock.)
KOUZOU SURU DOUSHITE

P+ Trailer Video

Tracklist

Onion+ is a new original song exclusive to P+! It’s PV was released prior to the release of the album and can be watched below.

Producer: Pinocchio-P
Featured Vocaloid: Hatsune Miku

  1. TAMANEGI+ (Onion+)
  2. Fireworks+
  3. HITORI NO KAERIMICHI+ (My Way Home Alone+)
  4. eight hunderd+
  5. PONKOTSU TENSHI+ (The Scraped Angel+)
  6. PSYCHEDELIC SMILE+
  7. NINGEN NANKA DAIKIRAI+ (I Just Hate People+)
  8. DOUSHITE-CHAN NO THEME+ (Doushite-chan’s theme+)

Be sure to support Pinocchio-P by purchasing the album! Happy 10 years to Pinocchio-P!
